name: InteractiveShell
description: Build web apps for interactive command-line tools

scripts.debug-start: npm run tsc && webpack --config webpack.debug-config.js && npm start
scripts.basic: npm run build && npm start M2 docker
scripts.local: npm run build && npm start M2 local
scripts.twoMachines: npm run build && npm start M2 ssh
scripts.twoMachines_forever: npm run build && forever start -l /home/ubuntu/webm2.logs/forever.log -o /home/ubuntu/webm2.logs/out.log -e /home/ubuntu/webm2.logs/err.log --append src/dist/index.js M2 ssh
scripts.start_singular: npm run build && npm start singular docker
scripts.basic_singular: npm run build && npm start singular local
scripts.ssh_singular: npm run build && npm start singular ssh
scripts.forever_singular: npm run build && forever start -l /home/user/logs/forever.log -o /home/user/logs/out.log -e /home/user/logs/err.log --append src/dist/index.js singular ssh
scripts.stop: kill `ps ax | grep Server | grep -v monitor | grep node | awk '{print $1}'`
scripts.lint: tslint -c tslint.json src/lib/*.ts src/startupConfigs/*.ts src/frontend/*.ts --fix && eslint ./public-source/ ./public/public-common/mathJaxConfig.js --fix && tslint
